website_summaries.verdict: Free from hormones and other additives, this adult dog food works particularly well for dogs with allergies.
pros: Formulated for adult dogs of various sizes
Free from hormones, pesticides, antibiotics, herbicides, and chemical additives
Available in a variety of sizes, including 25-lb
Owners say that dogs on this formula look better (coats), and that it works well for dogs with allergies
cons: Some buyers say there is too much grain in this blend
Some reports of dogs refusing to eat it

customer_reviews.title: DANGER:  Check your food before you feed it to your fur babies!
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our dog this food for years. Recently he has expressed disinterest in eating. We thought this was because of age. Upon looking and touching the food one day, I was cut by a piece of bone. It was protruding from each piece (not just one piece...almost EVERY bit in the bag). SHAME ON YOU NEWMAN'S OWN!! I will NEVER buy this product again. My poor dog, Fritz. No wonder he didn't want to eat, his poor mouth and tongue were being cut by the food. Check your quality control once in awhile!!!
customer_reviews.author: AAK PAK

customer_reviews.title: It now contains SOY
customer_reviews.text: They changed the ingredients with no warning just like so many other dog food companies have done! It now contains soy after 2 years or more of me feeding it to my dogs with no soy! This just isn't acceptable in a food of this distinction and in this price range. Will no longer be buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuvasz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT NON GMO FEED FOR MY BELOVED PETS
customer_reviews.text: I would NEVER buy my dogs feed with DEATH in their bowls, & GMO's are SEEDS OF DEATH ( watch the documentary on youtube SEEDS OF DEATH) - THIS IS A GREAT FEED, NO GMO PRODUCTS INIT & that means I am not feeding my dogs carcinogens & POISON. however, the bag SHOULD SAY NON-GMO ON IT. any NON_GMO product should have that stamped on it so we know it is a healthy product. wish it was sold in stores. all you get in stores are GMO POISONOUS FEEDS. BEWARE. don't feed your children or pets POISON LACED FOODS. GMO's change their DNA & cause many illness's. this is a great NON-GMO PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Did they change something?
customer_reviews.text: My mini schnauzer used to LOVE this food, but about 2 months ago he started to refuse it. It’s not his health because he will eat any other food except this. Oddly, a close friend had the same issue with her chihuahua. It makes me wonder if they altered the formula..
customer_reviews.author: Naveen

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Product
customer_reviews.text: Organic, Organic, Organic! Love your canines like your children. Additionally, all profits go to charity and you can actually see all of the amazing charities Newmans Own are involved in. Plus, it is Paul Newman guys- this product is a no brainer if you love your pets and want to contribute to society. I purchase with Subscribe and save for an extra discount and purchase 2 smaller bags which are cheaper that 1 large one.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.S.Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Longtime user... great food (or so the dog tells me)
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat organic, but my dog does. He's 85+ pounds, and has done well on this for at least 18 months. It's hard to find locally. Pros: Popular with the "consumer" Frequent Buyer Program -- see manufacturer's website Keeps dog regular Consistent quality Good customer service when contacting manufacturer Ingredients appear pretty healthy Not made in a suspicious country I trust the manufacturer No product recalls in recent history Cons: Price (although it depends what you compare to) Poor local availability where I live
customer_reviews.author: Venturans

customer_reviews.title: she is completely better. Because of the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: This bag of food, even after introducing it slowly over a period of a week, made my beagle sick: upset stomach and diarrhea. I had to take her to the vet, and a stool sample revealed excessive bacteria. I understand that it's hard to prove it was this food; however, after taking her off of this food, she is completely better. Because of the positive reviews, perhaps this particular bag was bad?
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food for my Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: I've had my dog on this food for three years now. His health was going down fast, and the vet prescribed food was making him worse, so I took a chance on Paul Newman's brand. He is 15+ and I swear PN Organic is the best food for him. No stomach issues anymore. I add about a third cup of warmed organic low sodium chicken stock to his food, as he is missing several teeth, and he loves the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: A. McKennon

customer_reviews.title: Our go to dog food
customer_reviews.text: Organic veggies and grains and all natural chicken? Thank you Newman's. My dog enjoys it and I'm happy about the high quality of the ingredients. I'm happy to support the Newman's mission. I contacted customer service and they directed me to their veterinarian stating their chicken suppliers use no antibiotics when raising the chickens.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Hated It :(
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a substitute for Whole Foods brand of grain free dog food (why is Amazon no longer carrying Whole Paws food?!) and bought this. Unfortunately both my dogs hate it. I had to buy some wet food to mix with it so they’d eat it. Not cheap. Not good. Not going to waste more money on what is apparently bland food.
customer_reviews.author: MountainTopMamaTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: After couple months I found it printed Best before June 2016 and it smell like bad
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 bag of this dog food, unfortunately I did not check it was near dated. After couple months I found it printed Best before June 2016 and it smell like bad food
customer_reviews.author: Richard Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Have had this item as a monthly Subscribe and Save item for the past couple years. Dog loves it. I love that I don't have to worry about going out and buying more dog food because it gets sent to our house on a very consistent basis. Thing I love the most about this is the price. In Hawaii, a 4lb bag of this exact brand/type is $17 on average. So 12lb for $20(ish) is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: acnm14

customer_reviews.title: Good Nutrition for our Beloved Fur Babies
customer_reviews.text: I switched over to this because its organic, my Frenchie actually ate some out of the bag and she is finicky ! A dog should only really defecate once a day and she does now , and because of nutrition, it should be dark, it is. This is a good food. Im very pleased. Her previous food was good, this is better. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gave dog food 2 stars because, for the second ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave dog food 2 stars because , for the second time, I was sent a bag that expires in less than 3 months. After receiving the first bag, I called and told a representative that my dog is fed canned dog food and veggies mixed with the dry, and that a 5 week expiration date will not work. I was told by a representative that I would be sent another bag with a 6 month expiration. That did not happen. The second bag also has a 5 week expiration date! If not for the above problem, the food rates 5 stars, my dog likes it, and it's working wonders for her G. I. system.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it more than any other similar treats we have tried, plus I feel assured that with Newman's Own I am getting a product that won't kill my dog, like some of the dog bones from China did a few years ago...
customer_reviews.author: Mister Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good price and doesn't expire for 7 plus months
customer_reviews.text: I could no longer by the large bag locally. I ordered it 2 days ago and received it today. I am very pleased. Today is April 26th and the expiration is not until December 2018. This is much better than I ever saw in the supermarket where I had been purchasing. I will continue to buy Newman's from Amazon as it is much easier than trying to locate it in the supermarket and much fresher.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: USA Made, Good Quality Food
customer_reviews.text: Nice USA made organically grown dog food. Our 2 year old dog was on another "natural" brand of dog food but seemed to have a problem with passing gas, burping a lot, and breathing difficulty. Since switching to Newman's, she has not and ANY of these issues! She cleans her bowl every time. Not BHT in this food. About as good as it gets for dry kibbles! Also contains no wheat or corn. Price is a bit high in the grocery store, but found it on Amazon for much less. Packaged neat and tidy, and arrived in one day! Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MMcD

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in product. Bought this in the grocery store and my dog ate it without a problem. However, she refused to eat any of the three bags I ordered through Amazon. She kept dumping out the food and covering it. Perhaps it is being stored somewhere where it picked up a smell or was old? No complaint with Amazon - they backed their product (refunded purchase).
customer_reviews.author: KL Reid

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE this and it is SO good for them. I am so glad for Amazon cause it has become impossible to find in the stores. Sprouts and Walmart used to sell everything by Newman for pets and now they dont. Grocery Outlet is the only store I OCCASIONALLY see it in. I will never feed my two cockers anything else - it is reasonably priced and has no bad things in it.
customer_reviews.author: The Art Witch

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I LOVE this dog food. Before discovering Newman's Own, I was buying the expensive prescription dog food from the vet's office for my dogs constant digestive problems. The problems stopped as soon as he started eating exclusively Newman's Own dog food. It's a very good price for the quality and I think it's great that the ingredients are real foods that I don't have to feel bad about giving to my dog. Thanks for the amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: missimegg

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Researched the company, researched the ingredients. Customer Service people are great. Sent free coupons when e-mailed with a question about which of their cat foods best for my two kitties (regular or advanced). Received good answers and not rote replies. This food is made in the USA with products from the USA and has all the ingredients I think are good for my cats. The two of them love, love this dry food and I have to ration it or they would chow day all day. I don't leave food out for any pet, cat or dog, to eat at will. They do not like Newman's canned food however so I don't force it on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... feeding them Newman's Own Organics has kept them in good health. It's among the most affordable way to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two elderly dogs (pugs) and I swear feeding them Newman's Own Organics has kept them in good health. It's among the most affordable way to feed your pet organic food (not to mention, the proceeds go towards charity!) and I truly believe my 11 and 14 year old dogs are as healthy as they are because of the organic food my dogs are consuming. Most dog foods out there (including the overpriced food the vet will try to sell you) is full of fillers - corn! This is one of the few dog foods out there that are made with ingredients we'd eat, as people.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L OMalley

customer_reviews.title: Best food yet
customer_reviews.text: My dog was getting rashes (from high-quality food) and I thought I'd try a different one. I initially saw this in the grocery store and, being a loyal Newman's Own fan in people food, I gave it a whirl. Well, not only has my dog's skin cleared up in just a couple of weeks, but she loves the taste. She's never been an over-eater, but the last food seemed to be less appetizing to her and-- I suspect-- caused her to lose weight. She eats this happily and also loves the turkey and sweet potato treats. I highly recommend this for dogs with food sensitivities. It is free of many common food allergens.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Ate It with No Complaint
customer_reviews.text: We have an older finicky dog who I doubted would eat Newman's Own. I was wrong. She dove right in, and has consistently finished her food since we introduced it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Heisey

customer_reviews.title: Never Been Recalled!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best dry foods ever made for a dog or cat, and more importantly Newman's has NEVER been recalled!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: My MinPin BuddyHolly
customer_reviews.text: We adopted him and put him on this stuff exclusively. His treats are Newman's and this is the food he gets. The vet praises his health at each visit, the groomer praises his coat also. It did take him a while to get used to this food but he devours it. He has put on healthy weight with it and has more energy then he did when he was a puppy when we got him. Even when we started him on this stuff he did not have a bad reaction to it and we did not have to ease him into it like you do with Blue Buffalo or something like that. Good stuff, we swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: I am full of appreciation for the good products they provide and the good works that they ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh I cannot say enough about this product and the company. First of all it is made from organic ingredients which holds more meaning than just pesticide free, hormone free, chemial free, it also represents meat from humanely raised animals. Second Newmans Own holds high standards and donates all profits, after taxes to a broad spectrum of charitable organizations. I am full of appreciation for the good products they provide and the good works that they support. Read about them, it is almost unheard of.
customer_reviews.author: brinkley

customer_reviews.title: She did eat it but it seemed like she waited until she HAD to eat it
customer_reviews.text: My dog seemed very dis-interested in it. She did eat it but it seemed like she waited until she HAD to eat it. I bought another dog food and mixed the two ....what can I tell you, she picked the other out and ate this last. I was disappointed in my dog, and the dog food. I like most of Newmans products that I use. I think it's just my dog.....she is very picky and spoiled!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dogfood
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food has really helped with allergies they had no longer scratching, coat is shiny. I cant say enough good things about this food. Would highly recommend to all animal owners to try. well worth the money. The reason i tried it was due to book i read called The confidential dog food report by andrew lewis. He has all the best dog foods on market now in his book , newmans own being just one of eight. Tried it will never go back to anyother food. Thanks to newmans own line you are helping my dogs live a longer and healthy life.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dogs have eaten it their entire life. Only thing that I don’t like is the constant fluctuations in price, sometimes from day to day. Both on Amazon and Chewy. Highly recommend the product. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding our dog Newman's Own since she was very young. She was a finiky eater and I was a determined owner who insisted on organic food. Both of our needs were fulfilled when we found this great product. It's the only dog food that she has eaten and she is going to be 9 years old next month. The only reason she ever has gone to the vet is for her shots. I highly recommend this food....I am SOOO glad amazon carries it now because we had to drive quite a distance to buy it before at a organic pet shop.....
customer_reviews.author: Dennie

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Really Like It
customer_reviews.text: We've fed our dogs Newman's for roughly nine years. It is one of the two kinds we normally use and we think it provides them with good nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it, allergies seem better
customer_reviews.text: I was just giving my dog grocery store dog food but she kept getting ear infections. Every couple of months no matter how clean I kept them. It took an embarrassingly long time for me to make the connection to the food but once I made the switch, her ears have been so much better. The one thing I have noticed, which is a good thing overall, is that there seems to be more fiber in this than in the cheap stuff. Her #2s are more voluminous and also a little softer. It's probably good for her insides but a little grosser to pick up 3x/day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Healthier Happier Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great for my senior dachshund as well as for my younger dachshund. Charlie, my 15 year old, is acting friskier and happier and younger after 3 weeks of eating this food. And my younger guy is doing well too. Their coats are silky and shiny, their skin is not so itchy and their general health is better. I will keep feeding them this food. I've found what works well for them and I appreciate the Newman brands philanthropic activities, so it is a win-win-win.
customer_reviews.author: KT09

customer_reviews.title: Premium fast shipping excellent ingredients if you love your babies
customer_reviews.text: My girls find this absolutely delicious and after all Paul Newman doesn't get much better than this
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Otay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I buy Newmans Own adult dog food for my two chihuahuas. I've always fed them natural, human-grade dog food, even though most brands can be a bit pricey. Like most pet parents, I try to do the best I can for my dogs which starts with feeding them right. Most dog food can be disgusting and the practices behind it are disturbing. Newmans Own is more affordable, and I feel good about the company's ethics and practices so it was worth a try. My dogs love it so it was easy to switch from the other brand. They gobble it up! I now have it on subscription so we don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog food!
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is excellent but is harder to find in our local stores. Thank goodness for Amazon Prime where continuous supply is a available. We have mini Schnauzers who have used this dog food for 8 years with success. Good coat/skin, appetite and stable weight.
customer_reviews.author: BHMMary

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy clean organic dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food. I used to buy local for years But they don’t carry it anymore. I bought another dog food temporarily and wasn’t pleased . Thank God I found it on Amazon! Happy healthy poochie ! Vets always compliment his shiney coat. No health issues .
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Boston Terrier
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a Boston Terrier with a very sensitive stomach and have had a lot of trouble finding the perfect food. We have previously tried Purina One (which he enjoyed the flavor and texture of but it gave him terrible gas) and Iams Healthy Naturals (Less gas but he barely touched it, 1 cup food would sit in his bowl all day). As soon as I filled his bowl with a combo of this and the Iams he gobbled it up. The size of the kibble is great for him and he seems to be enjoying the flavor. He already has perked up and is more playful and loving than ever. I have one happy pup!
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Great Cause
customer_reviews.text: I can't find locally anymore after purchasing for my dog. He never has any issues.
customer_reviews.author: skimomnw2

customer_reviews.title: Great for my epileptic dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a PBGV ( Petit Basset Griffon Vendeen) who has epilepsy. He takes Phenobaritol and I have discovered when he has this food he has no seizures. Before we started him on this food he had seizures every 4-6 weeks despite the medication. Once we ran out and fed him a different food. During that time he had several seizures. So I am sold on this dog food. It is reasonably priced especially on subscription ( except when AMazon raised the price for a couple of months)
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET& PETER

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about switching over to this brand but I'm happy to say, my dog loves this stuff. I don't even need to add leftover meat scraps or gravy sauce like I did to his old food. This stuff is way better than the crap they sell at those chain stores. Can't beat the price with S&S! Also love that they come in smaller resealable bags which keeps the food fresh. Better to open up a brand new bag every couple weeks than to leave a huge opened bag of kibble in the pantry for months.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: first rate dog food
customer_reviews.text: Newman's Own has been an excellent choice for my dog. The ingredients are organic and high quality; her coat is beautifully conditioned and she has never had an allergic response as with some of the more expensive products from the vet's office. Also, she is a small dog and the kibble bits are easy for her to chew. It was annoying that the price was reduced between the time of my order and the delivery, but Amazon made an immediate adjustment. I like the 4-pound bags for freshness because my dog is small and takes awhile to eat that much, but there are other sizes available to suit larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: annieO

customer_reviews.title: Cooper loves it
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only dog food my dog will eat and we’ve tried everything
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cross

customer_reviews.title: Organic ingredients, highly rated & my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this food based on the Dog Food Advisor rating, which gave it 4 out of 5 stars. They deducted a star because this has a slightly lower protein content than its 5-star foods. That wasn't a huge concern for me, as I supplement my dogs kibble with things like eggs, salmon or peanut butter. The price is very good for a food of this quality, and my dog and I are both happy with it! I love that it's available through Amazon's Subscribe and Save program.
customer_reviews.author: BullyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and happy pups!
customer_reviews.text: My two pups have been on this good for many years since all of the recall issues started! I also buy the wet food and mix it! Beautiful coats and they gobble it up! No recalls ever! Great food!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M McConnell

customer_reviews.title: I have subscribed to this food, it makes things ...
customer_reviews.text: I have subscribed to this food, it makes things so much easier for me because I was previously going to the pet food store every time my dog ran out of food. I'm forgetful so sometimes I'd have to cook chicken for him until I remembered to grab some food. Now it's delivered right to my door every month, just as I'm about to run out. My dog is slightly put off by the less frequent cooked chicken dinners, but he gets equal nutrition at all times now :)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: How you can tell it is great...
customer_reviews.text: The dogs had been eating Purina for a long, long time. I switched to Newman's Own and I noticed something only a dog owner would be conscious of...the waste. They no longer expel foul odorous waste, which Purina seemed to do to them regularly. Since they've been on Newman's, their waste is almost odorless and, well...it is easy to pick up. You can tell it's nutritious by what comes out, and if you have to pick up after your dog daily, like myself, you'll appreciate the cleaner output.
customer_reviews.author: CM9

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty feed
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves it. We have a small breed, chihuahua corgi mix. This is one of his favorite dry foods and I love feeding him organic quality at such wonderful price.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry M.

customer_reviews.title: Newman's Own Organics Adult Dog Food Formula, 12.5-Pound Bag
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this dog food, my standard poodles have done best with this food and we have gone through several high-end brands. I have one dog that is pretty picky and has a sensitive stomach (almost like IBS) and she has done the best with this food. The only reason why I did not give the product 5 stars is I feel the product is a little more expensive than I would care to pay. However I understand a lot of the profits go to charities so I continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VVV

customer_reviews.title: Five woofs from our Baker!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a winner with our 1 1/2 year old "Schorky" that's a min-schnauzer and Yorkshire terrier. I mix a little of of the canned chicken and rice formula in for a change and he really cleans his plate. It's great to know that i'm feeding him good food without fillers and a product that is "cruelty free".
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett 13

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: After receiving notice of so many dog food "recalls" - we searched again for a healthy food which would still be reasonable in price. Newman's comes well-recommended on Dog Food Advisor (  ) ...and our pup really loves it. We use it for "treats" as well - since a number of those products have also experienced a recall. With fast shipping from Amazon...this is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!
customer_reviews.text: My Shi Tzu has been on Newman's dry dog food for many years. My grocer does not carry it anymore. I was pleased find it on Amazon. She loves it with a little chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like ?
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it! All organic! Good price, cheaper than other organics. and the Paul Newman family are wonderful people ... all the profits from their dog food and snack products go to dog charities (all the profits from their cat food products go to cat charities, all the profits from their people food products go to people and kids charities) Buying this dog food is a no brainer for my wife and me.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Mellon

customer_reviews.title: What is your dog worth?
customer_reviews.text: The only thing organic are the grains, and grains aren't good for dogs. He loves the flavor, but has begun constantly itching. Costco Organic isn't that much more.
customer_reviews.author: Lostcamber

customer_reviews.title: Newman's own Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I liked the the Newman's Own product and my two miniature schnauzers did as well. Only problem was when it was time to re-order, it wasn't available at Amazon.com, and I was leaving for vacation. I couldn't find Newman's Own when I needed it, so bought the brand, Blue, and my dogs took to it just just fine. I was pleased to see I can purchase Blue for Senior Dogs from Amazon.com, and will be buying that in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the small bag this last time. I have a really small dog and we only needed a little to supplement her canned food and snacks. I have to say, it's nice to have this big bag. It allows me to be more generous and I put out more. I keep the bag rolled down, closed, and it smells really fresh. It has a really tasty smell and my fussy dog likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue Buehler

customer_reviews.title: This is the only dog food I will give my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that Newman products seem to be of very good quality and they donate their profits to charities.
customer_reviews.author: BooNotes

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality food and the company stands behind their product. It's a little high in carbs for my older dog so I mix it with a grain free alternative sometimes. I had a bag that had some moldy kibble in it and the company took it VERY seriously. The chief vet there called me personally to assure me what my dog had eaten would not harm her and then sent 2 new bags right to my door express mail and recalled all the bags in that lot. How often these days does a big company give THAT kind of service? Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Martorana

customer_reviews.title: Quality pet food
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an organic food after the melamine poisoning of pet food debacle. Newman's Own dry foods for cats and dogs are manufactured in the US per their corporate veterinarian. Newman's Own is up front about their ingredients. For an organic food it is affordable. Also it has been great at keeping skin issues under control. Lastly Newman's Own is listed as a "More Responsible Pet Food Company" on several websites.
customer_reviews.author: Becky K-B

customer_reviews.title: One of the best commercial brands out there
customer_reviews.text: One of the best commercial brands out there, and one of the best affordable dry dog foods. My rescue pup looked like a hot mess when I got him and was feeding him Science Diet, and I phased him onto this stuff. No tummy issues, and his coat looks more beautiful everyday. It is only marginally more expensive than Science Diet, and lightyears better in terms of ingredients. Plus, I never feel silly about spending the extra money because Newman's Own gives 100% of profits to charities after tax. Win-win, all around.
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because my dog likes it and because, as a vegetarian not comfortable with feeding a dog an all-vegetable diet, the fact that the chicken in it is from animals that were humanely treated during their lives. It's more expensive than many store-bought brands, but I think the extra money is worth it and you can always find good deals if you do some comparison shopping online.
customer_reviews.author: luckydogdc

customer_reviews.title: If indeed all products used in this food comes from Us companies then I can breathe a little easier and if its true then I have
customer_reviews.text: I have used this food for quite a while, normally buy it in our local grocery store. If indeed all products used in this food comes from Us companies then I can breathe a little easier and if its true then I have to say I absolutely love it. Sick and tired of buying what is labeled USDA certified organic and then finding out that it was grown in China and labeled in USA as so many ORGANIC products are.E.P..
customer_reviews.author: ellen palermo

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The dog shares her appreciation. Fairly priced and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: The Shadowman

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food ever I might eat it too!
customer_reviews.text: I was feeding my dog IAMS he would throw up with out fail at least once or twice a month in the more recent months I thought it was something he ate outside. Turns out it was the dog food. IAMS has has so many recalls I did not know about. I switched to Newmans and my dog stopped throwing up his skin and fur have softened and hes more relaxed over all better health. I can't believe the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Here Gromit a censored Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I've always given my dog what I thought was high quality dog food since she was a puppy. After the pet food issues of a few years ago I switched to only organic dog food for her. Since she is only 10 lbs the price difference isn't too bad. I am a free feeder which isn't ideal but means my dog basically has access to food any time she wants it. Because of this she only gets really excited when "people" food is offered to her. Well when I open this bag she comes over and eats asap. Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: EMHNYC

customer_reviews.title: Newmans is good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Well, normally I buy dry dog food at pet store. I bought Nutramax for many yrs. I thought my dog might want a change. I am skeptical about some dog foods and the CORN base, which is a no no for dogs. Cows or pigs yes, but no meat eating canines. Newmans seems like a good dog food and my dog eats it with no problems. I would recommend it too. The ingredients are great and the price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Just what my dog needed!
customer_reviews.text: Have two cocker spaniels. It was a challenge to find the right dog food for the older one, as he would get very gassy. I tried at least 5-6 different brands with no success. Then another cocker spaniel owner recommended me this one. NO MORE GAS!! Both of them love it. Their coat is looking so much shinier and healthier. And they now shed very less. I would'nt feed my dogs anything else now. Very highly recommended! And the price and service from Amazon is unbeatable!!
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: This solved my pups dog food allergy problems when I started purchasing it (I have a husky and a german shepherd), but several months ago the itching started again; the color and size of the kibble even noticeably changed. I wrote a letter of inquiry to Newman's, with batch numbers from the bags, but have received no answer. Since then, I've purchased both Solid Gold Wolf King and Royal Canine 24 German Shepherd and the dogs are doing okay again.
customer_reviews.author: sggall

customer_reviews.title: Food Allergies Gone
customer_reviews.text: I had tried other organic or gluten free products but went looking for something new when my dog was still itching on veterinarian-recommended gluten-free Science Diet. His itching problem has greatly diminished by switching to this. It's not a cure-all but it's been a fantastic start, and I appreciate that it doesn't cost an arm and a leg like some of the other options we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kimpropriety

customer_reviews.title: Very good natural dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very comforting for owners that it is all natural (and mostly organic) with no by products and preservatives. We gave our dog (a 7 year old lab mix) PetPromise before. After the transition it took a couple of days for her to get used to it, but once she did she loves it. My dog is quite picky about her food and she likes "junk food" better rather than wholesome food and treats (of course!). She is very used to Newman's own now and it gives her very good bowl movement. Always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pan

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it. I love that Amazon carries it...
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this at a local health food store and then they stopped carrying it. Then I was thrilled when I found it Wal-Mart, but then they stopped stocking the dry kibble and now only carry the Newman's doggie mush in cans. So, I couldn't believe it when I found it here - Amazon really does sell just about everything! My Shih Tzus like it and they do not get sick at all like they did periodically on the non-organic but still expensive, "vet-recommended", brands.
customer_reviews.author: Been there! maybe

customer_reviews.title: Great food.
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this food from Blue Buffalo. I hate to say it, but around the time Blue started doing tv commercials the food started upsetting my dog's stomach. Perhaps that's a coincidence, but it was a reason to switch regardless of the timing. The Newman's food has been great. My dog loves the food. He has been energetic and in great health. Not much more that you could ask. The bag of treats that comes in the 12.5 lb bag is a fantastic bonus to every bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gallo

customer_reviews.title: I like to support Newman's but my dog doesn't lol.
customer_reviews.text: My picky chihuahua didn't care for the taste. It smelled a little bland too. I tasted one though lol and it seemed pretty good. We switched him to Rachel Ray's grain free Nutrish and he likes it more. I think the smell is more appealing to him. This food is also hard to find locally so it was a pain when he ran out. We can get Rachel's food in most Wal-marts in the area.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Only dog food that didn't flare up my dogs food allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog had food allergies and this was the only dog food he could eat. We tried everything from the most expensive brand at the pet store, down to the cheap stuff. After months and months of issues, this stopped them completely. Poor pup had suffered from eye discharge, itchy skin, and "bottom" gland issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mech

customer_reviews.title: Newman’s Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Our Boston Terrier eats the dog food but sometimes gets gassy
customer_reviews.author: R Swihart

customer_reviews.title: Great value for my Springer Spaniel
customer_reviews.text: Great value for my Springer Spaniel. A bag lasts about 3 weeks (2 cups per day). Only downside is it leaves his breath smelling VERY FISHY all the time - but he's happy so I'm happy. Get this on Amazon Subscribe and save and never think about dog food again. I get one bag per month and manually order a separate bag once every 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sachs

customer_reviews.title: Great price on subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food, no artificial ingredients and also lessens the amount of stool. This is the best deal as I add it to my subscribe and save program for delivery each month and you can't beat it, what with free shipping and no tax, delivered right to my door!
customer_reviews.author: morey

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this food for the last three years. Every food I fed him before this caused smelly gas problems. He almost never has gas on this food. Also, people often comment on how good he smells. However, when he goes to grandma's and eats junk food for a week or two he always comes home smelling like a dog. It's totally the food. On top of that, he loves it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: average food, the dogs hated it
customer_reviews.text: happily I did not purchase a bigger bag, the dogs hated this food. been trying to find a good nutritional food for the dogs and have tried several different brands, but still am looking. the only way to get the dogs to eat the dry food that they do not like is to mix it with some canned food, and even then they were reluctant to eat this food
customer_reviews.author: John in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Good food.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I've been having trouble finding this in our grocery stores lately. Our dog has been eating this for 4 years and is in great health, so glad I don't have to switch foods.
customer_reviews.author: sibyll

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love This Food!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried other brands after thinking I needed more grain free for my dogs. When i went to the local pet store and tried two other high end grain free..my dogs turned their nose up and walked away! ugh! I did not know what to do, they wouldn't eat. I thought well i will go back to Paul Newman and surprise... they started eating again so yes, this is what they love!!!
customer_reviews.author: pattecake

customer_reviews.title: OK with my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Not too much I can say about the taste since I don't eat it but the dogs don't complain. They walk away from the bowl if I try to feed them low cost grocery store dog food so this must be satisfactory. The Newman's Own brand of people foods has been good in my opinion so that's why I pay the price to give this to our family friends, hoping that it will keep them in good health.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and didn't break our budget!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy dog food choice for our older dogs. It is not full of fillers that would cause your dog to go to the bathroom more. We also have an older dog that has a sensitive digestive track and this brand did not make him gassy.
customer_reviews.author: LRJ

customer_reviews.title: Gives my Dalmatian mix horrible gas!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a no-corn natural dog food to keep skin rashes away...tried Halo which was great but so expensive. This is a little more affordable and the ingredient list looks very similar to Halo, but....oh boy. I'm just glad it's warm enough to have the windows open! My dog loves the taste and the quality seems great, so we'll try 2 more days to see if things settle down.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Baker

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this organic dog food for my schipperkes.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 schipperkes, and the female had such horrid breath that we would joke that she could drop a vulture from his perch with one sniff of her breath. Well her breath is TOTALLY better. We allow her to give us kisses now. Our entire family can't believe the difference it has made! We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine E. Siggins

customer_reviews.title: We attribute this to his continued good health.
customer_reviews.text: The only food we will give our 16 yr. old lab. We attribute this to his continued good health.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. Great organic food for dog. My Boston terrier's tummy is sensitive to other store available food but Newman's food seems to go well with his diet. This only available at health food stores like Sprout so I signed up for quarterly delivery which works out great for me. If only Newman come up with more flavors than just chicken, like lamb or something.
customer_reviews.author: 1Tea8uyer

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our mini Aussie loves this food. And, I trust Newman's Own to be healthier and better quality than the mass market brands. My dog has never had a digestion issue with it, and gobbles every morsel. The price on 12.5 lb bag is much better than the 7 lb bag I can buy at my local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaDink

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a rescue dog who had an allergy to corn. I checked every bag in local stores but all main fillers were corn. I thought I would have to drive to nearest pet store (120 mile round trip)to find a corn free dog food. Then I found this brand on Amazon which listed all the ingretents. No corn! My dog loves it so much, I even use it as a trick when training her. I'll be buying again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves Food - We Like Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I like Newman's Own for my family due to its consistent quality and good ingredients; I like have the opportunity to provide the same quality products to my animals. Amazon makes it convenient to get multiple bags in manageable sizes that appear on my front porch according to my schedule. I got the three four-pound bags; talk about portability and storability!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brody

customer_reviews.title: Great product just need to adjust the subscription.
customer_reviews.text: My two small dogs took to the food immediately so well in fact I have had to move up the subscription for the 12 pound bag. Since they are young its not immediate if they look healthier or bouncier as they seem to be that way all the time. What I have noticed is there business is allot more controlled and any problems such as regurgitation which I had in past products have gone away. If your a prime member I would suggest setting up a subscription and be rid of of the chore of last minute runs to buy dog food and also know you are giving your pets a quality tier of dog food.
customer_reviews.author: City17

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Food, Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: My Min Pin has been on Newman's Own Dog Food since the day I got him as a puppy........and he just turned 18! I swear, the fact that he has lived this long must have something to do with the food he's always eaten. I recommend this dog food to EVERY DOG OWNER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Owen

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful food for your pooch.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has many food sensitivities, and this food has been wonderful. It must taste good too, because otherwise he would not be eating it the way he does. I also purchase this food for my grandpup, a boxer mix, and anyone who knows boxers knows how sensitive a digestive system they have. This food is wonderful for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf-pup's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They fed this to my dog in the shelter from where I adopted him. I believed all the advertising and initially tried the "best" much more expensive food and found that my dog didn't like it any better. As soon as that very expensive bag was gone we switched back to this. My dog has been eating and loving Newman's Own( all profits to charity) for over 7 years :)
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: It's really good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: When my little Shih Tzu eats this, his BMs are healthy. It's really good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Franny F.

customer_reviews.title: My Two Yorkies Love This Food
customer_reviews.text: I have two Yorkies. A four year old and a four month old. They both love this food. It makes their hair very soft. I trust Newman's Own as a good brand of organic dog food for my dogs. They never get sick eating this food. I use Amazon's Subscribe and Save to have it delivered at a reduced price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My dog didnt like this, it wasnt that impressed with the ingredients once it was here, seems dry. Had really great reviews so doesnt hurt to try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He eats it with great appetite, whether mixed with the can food as ...
customer_reviews.text: What my dog likes is a sure recommendation of course, but what is more important is that it agrees with him and keeps him healthy and active. He eats it with great appetite, whether mixed with the can food as a meal, or as "Crunchy Treats".
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Pup's loved it...
customer_reviews.text: High quality dog food....and the pup's loved it with or without any moist food on top. Paper bag so check carefully for those invasive mealy bugs as they are tough to wipe out. So far so good with my orders on Amazon and dog food in paper bags. Plastic sealed food and treats are what I try to get.
customer_reviews.author: CU2MRO

product_meta.title: Newman'S Own Adult Dog Food Formula
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:12.5-Pound BagNewman’s Own Adult Dog Formulas provide complete and balanced nutrition with just the right protein-fat ratios for dogs of all life stages. The recipes are made with organic grains and vegetables and, of course, have no wheat, corn or artificial colors or flavors. Newman's Own, Inc., founded by Paul Newman in 1982, offers great tasting, high quality food and beverage products for people and pets. Products include salad dressings, pasta sauces, frozen pizza, salsa, refrigerated drinks, cookies, barbecue sauce and snacks as well as dog food, cat food and pet treats. Newman's Own Foundation continues Paul Newman's commitment to use 100% of royalties and profits that it receives from the sale of its food products for charitable purposes. Over $500 million has been given to thousands of charities since 1982.
feature_bullets: A Delcious Blend Of Chicken And Organic Brown Rice Containing Chicken As The First Ingredient
Free Of Added Antibiotics And Chemical Additives
No Artificial Colors Or Flavor Enhancers
Crunchy Kibble Helps Keep Teeth Clean

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
